description: Smallest possible sum of n positive integers g(1) < g(2) < ... < g(n) such that A001222(g(i)+g(j))=A001222(g(i))+A001222(g(j)) for all 1<=i<j<=n.
example: For n=3, we have g(1)=2, g(2)=6, g(3)=10 with the sum a(3)=18.
crossrefs: Row sums of the triangle A207975.
author: _Naohiro Nomoto_, Jan 29 2001
extensions: Edited and a(6)-a(10) added by _Max Alekseyev_, Feb 22 2012
